title: Context-Based Ontology Customized Mathematics Leadership Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and managerial work experience
context.additional_context: A practical mathematics leadership training program utilizing VR simulations in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can solve probability problems occurring in workplace scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Successfully complete budget allocation optimization tasks in VR simulations at least twice out of three attempts.
Utilize math content tailored to individual learning contexts via an ontology-based recommendation system with over 90% engagement.
Apply statistical analysis techniques for team performance evaluation in a practice environment at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
